summary: This mod takes the mage glove mesh's from the Unofficial Skyrim Patch that do not clip with sleeves like the vanilla glove mesh does and combines it with the glove textures from "wet and cold" by Isoku and "Glove and Boots - Rodnix" so your characters can use those gloves without clipping through sleeves.
descriptionHtml:
This mod takes the mage glove mesh's from the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19/?]Unofficial Skyrim Patch[/url] that do not clip with sleeves, like the vanilla glove mesh's do and combines it with the glove textures from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27563/?]wet and cold[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15675]Glove and Boots - Rodnix[/url] so your characters can use those gloves without clipping through sleeves.

Also added is the vanilla glove texture using the uskp mesh.

For both males and females as they both have some clothes that clip with vanilla glove textures.

I might Possibly update this mod with more textures if I find any other mods that use glove textures for these gloves and get permission to use them if they exist and\or if I create some textures myself.
[b]



=installation=

[/b]place the "data" folder into your "data" skyrim directory, or just load the zip into nmm, mod organizer, etc
[b]



=How to get the gloves=

[/b]To get the gloves you must open the console with ~ and type the following bolded words and characters   [b]help "gloves,"   [/b]including the [b]  ,   [/b]a list of all the available gloves will appear in the console, use PgUp and PgDn to navigate up and down in the console and type   [b]player.additem   [/b]and then space and type the item code and add another space then the number of items you want i.e. 200 will get you 200 gloves

for exmaple:   [b]player.additem 050012d3 1   [/b]gets me the gloves with the green wet and cold texture




[b]=Credits and Permissions=[/b]

[b]I got permission from the mod authors to use their assets in this mod, credit goes to them for their assets and if you yourself want to use any of their assets used in this mod you need to contact them.

speaking of mod authors... [/b]

Credit and thanks go to the following people for letting me use their assets.

Thanks to Isoku for the use of the glove textures featured in [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27563/?]wet and cold[/url] 
--
Thanks to the people behind the Unofficial Patch Project Team and specifically the one who uploaded the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19/?]Unofficial Skyrim Patch[/url], Arthmoor, for the use of the "mage glove" mesh's in the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19/?]uskp[/url] the mesh that does not clip through sleeves
--
Thanks to Rodnix creator of, [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15675]Glove and Boots - Rodnix[/url] for use of the glove textures from his mod

[b]THANKS!! [/b]
author: marchofflowers
